title: Monster & Magic Bundle
description: Bring your video game to life with 512 monster and magic sounds
longDescription:
Monster & Magic Bundle


Includes 4 libraries in total:

·        Elemental Spells Vol 1: Defined for elemental magic of all types.

·        Fantasy Magic Weapons Vol 1: Geared towards magical swords and bows

·        Monster Library Vol 1: Small and medium sized monsters set in many famous games.

·        Monster Library Vol 2: Oversized Monsters

 


Elemental Spells Vol 1

Discover the world of elemental magics

This is the first volume of elemental magic sounds. This library is oriented for any video game that needs elemental magic sounds, whether in RPG games, adventures, turn-based games, etc... you can find 100 High-Quality sound Effects divided in:

  • Dark Spell
  • Fire Spell
  • Ice Spell
  • Lightning Spell
  • Poison Spell
  • Rock Spell
  • Water Spell
  • Wind Spell


Preview & documentation:

Youtube

Information

Metadata


Each elemental magic sound include:

- Whoosh, Hit, Buff, Spell and unique magic actions for each.


More about the pack:

  • Intuitive file naming
  • All you’ll ever need regarding magical elemental sounds [Use them again & again]
  • Use the sound effects over and over, in any of your projects or productions, forever without any additional fees or royalties. Use the SFX in your game, in your trailer, in a Kickstarter campaign, wherever you need to, as much as you want to.
  • Totally mono compatibility
  • All sounds have several variations.


Features

  • 100 Unique magic elemental spells
  • Number of Audio Waves: 100
  • Format: 48,100 Hz / 16 bit
  • Do Sound FX loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes and 19 seconds


Fantasy Magic Weapons Vol 1


Adds a lot of sounds of fantasy magic weapons

With this package you will get sounds of swords and magical bows, where you can find everything from elemental magic for each weapon, to impacts, impacts are blood, etc... These sounds are divided into 173 High-Quality sounds:

  • Magic Sword
  • Dark-sword
  • Magic-bow
  • Elemental Sword
  • Elemental Bow
  • Elemental buffs
  • Elemental Whoosh


Preview & documentation:

Youtube

Information

Metadata


More about the pack:

  • Some sounds have variations with reverb and without reverb.
  • You can find extended versions of some attacks so you just have to drag and drop.
  • Intuitive file naming.
  • The sounds can be used for different weapons (not only swords and bows, you choose).
  • All you'll ever need regarding magical weapons sounds.


Features

  • 173 Unique magic elemental spells
  • Number of Audio Waves: 173
  • Format: 44.000 Hz / 16 bit
  • Do Sound FX loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes and 19 seconds


Monster Library Vol 1

Lots of creatures for your audiovisual project

You will get a wide variety of monsters, from small, medium and large size. In this library we have tried to recreate all the characteristics of the monsters, breathing, gills, visceral movements, etc. This library is divided into:

  • Attacks.
  • Danger Sounds.
  • Friendship Call
  • Scream
  • Footsteps
  • Footstep with Material
  • Growl
  • Slobber
  • Breathings
  • Roars
  • Eating
  • Grunt
  • Death
  • Receive Attack
  • Mutation
  • Bite
  • Angry
  • Flying


Preview & documentation:

Youtube

Information

Metadata


More about the pack

  • Intuitive file naming
  • All you’ll ever need regarding magical elemental sounds [Use them again & again]
  • Use the sound effects over and over, in any of your projects or productions, forever without any additional fees or royalties. Use the SFX in your game, in your trailer, in a Kickstarter campaign, wherever you need to, as much as you want to.
  • Totally mono compatibility
  • All sounds have between 3 and 5 variations.
  • The sounds of Breathe and Fly are in Loop format.


Features

  •  141 unique monster sounds
  • Most of the sounds are split into regular and caw versions so you can freely choose which one to use.
  • Number of Audio Waves: 141
  • Format: 44,100 Hz / 16 bits
  • Do Sound FX loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 3 minutes and 12 seconds


Monster Library Vol 2

Lots of creatures for your audiovisual project

You will get 107 with a wide variety of sounds for your monsters, we have tried to recreate some characteristics of creatures, such as breathing, deaths, different types of steps according to materials, eating, etc. This library is divided into:

  • Performing attacks (different intensities)
  • Receiving attack sounds
  • Deaths
  • Growls
  • Shouts
  • Eating
  • Breaths
  • Footsteps
  • Grunts
  • Screams

  • Totally mono compatibility
  • All sounds have several variations.
  • Include Dragon sounds

technicalDetails:
Features:

·        521 Monster And Magics sounds Effects

·        Number of Audio Waves: 512

·        Number of Audio Cues: 512

·        Sample rate / bit rate: 48.000 Hz & 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

·        Do Sound FX loop: Yes

·        Minutes of audio provided: 18 minutes and 38 seconds

·        Supported Development Platforms: All

·        Documentation
